text: Agar tum zakhmi huye ho to tumharay mukhalif log bhi to aisay hi zakhmi ho chukay hain hum inn dino ko logon kay darmiyan adaltay badaltay rehtay hain. (shikast-e-ohod) iss liye thi kay Allah Taalaa eman walon ko zahir ker dey aur tum mein say baaz ko shahdat ka darja ata farmaye Allah Taalaa zalimon say mohabbat nahi kerta
